pci:markup.html5:script:
<html5:div class="tr-tabs js-page-tabs tr-tabs-{{tabsPosition}} clearfix">
        {{#if showTabs}}
        <html5:ul class="tr-tab-buttons js-tab-buttons">
            {{#each pages}}
            <html5:li data-page-num="{{@index}}" data-page-id="{{id}}" class="tr-tab-buttons__item">
                <html5:span class="tr-tab-label">{{inc @index}}</html5:span>
            </html5:li>
            {{/each}}
        </html5:ul>
        {{/if}}     
        <html5:div class="tr-pages-wrap clearfix">
            <div class="tr-pages" style="height: {{pageWrapperHeight}}px">
                {{#each pages}}
                <html5:div data-page-num="{{@index}}" data-page-id="{{id}}" class="tr-page js-tab-content tr-tabs-{{@index}}">
                    <div class="tr-passage" style="height: {{../pageHeight}}px" >
                        {{#each content}}
                        <html5:div class="tr-passage-column widget-blockInteraction js-page-column" data-page-col-index="{{@index}}">
                            {{{this}}}
                        </html5:div>
                        {{/each}}
                    </html5:div>
                </html5:div>
                {{/each}}
            </html5:div>
        </html5:div>
    </html5:div>

{{#if showNavigation}} <html5:div class="tr-nav-wrap tr-nav-{{tabsPosition}}"> <html5:div class="tr-nav"> <html5:div class="tr-nav__col js-prev-page"> <html5:button class="btn-info small">{{../buttonLabels.prev}}</html5:button> </html5:div> <html5:div class="tr-nav__col"> Page <html5:span class="js-current-page">{{../currentPage}}</html5:span> / {{../pagesNum}} </html5:div> <html5:div class="tr-nav__col js-next-page"> <html5:button class="btn-info small">{{../buttonLabels.next}}</html5:button> </html5:div> </html5:div> </html5:div> {{/if}}
